note:
Non-negotiable: Death to fascism/punch nazis,ACAB, Trans Rights are Human Rights, Black Lives Matter, Abortion is Healthcare, Earth Cannot Afford the Rich.

A former refugee—if there is such a thing as a *former* one. We carry our scars for life.

Why follow requests?
I’m just screening for nazi trolls and crypo-bots/bros.
